data.current_description: Returns audit logs based on filters.
data.summary_suggestion: Retrieve CMS audit logs with filtering and pagination
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves a paginated collection of CMS content audit logs from your HubSpot account. Supports filtering by date range, user, action type, and other criteria through query parameters. Returns audit log entries containing details about CMS changes including timestamps, user information, action types, and affected content. Supports pagination through limit and offset parameters to navigate large result sets.

data.current_description: Returns audit logs based on filters.
data.summary_suggestion: Retrieve CMS audit logs with filtering and pagination
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves a paginated collection of CMS content audit logs from your HubSpot account. Supports filtering by date range, user, action type, and other criteria through query parameters. Returns audit log entries containing details about CMS changes including timestamps, user information, action performed, and affected content. Results are paginated and can be sorted. Requires OAuth2 or private app authentication.
